text: Manuel Sesimbra Vicente (born 15 May 1956) is an Angolan politician. He has been Vice President of Angola since September 2012. He was born in Central Luanda. Before becoming vice president, Vicente served as the chairman of Sonangol. Sonangol is an oil and natural gas company owned by the government of Angola.Shrikesh Laxmidas, "Oilman Vicente waits in Angola presidential wings" , Reuters, 1 February 2012. == References == Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Angola Category:1956 births Category:Luanda Province
title: Manuel Vicente
